data.name: Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator - OST
data.detailed_description:
Complete your Beans experience with the full original soundtrack for Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator.

This album contains 38 original tracks of chiptune-jazz as well as some more upbeat video-game inspired chiptune boss themes.
The album spans levels, which also span genres of jazz inspiration.

The files are provided in both MP3 and OGG format.

Track List



Miscellaneous
  • Beans Theme
  • The Calamitous Coffee Consortium
  • Caffeine Confrontation

Big City Showdown
  • Memories
  • Another Day
  • City Galore
  • Coffee Crunch
  • Espresscapade
  • Milk White

Albert's Tutorial

data.short_description: Complete your Beans experience with the Original Soundtrack. Containing 36 original chiptune songs, you can take Beans wherever you go. Provided in MP3 and OGG format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or Better
  • 處理器: 1 GHz Processor
  • 記憶體: 1 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: OpenGL Supported Graphics Adapter
pc_requirements.recommended:
建議配備:
  • 作業系統: Windows 7 64-Bit or Newer
  • 處理器: 1 GHz Processor
  • 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: nVidia or AMD with at least 512MB VRAM and OpenGL 2.0+
  • 網路: 寬頻網際網路連線

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Mac OSX 10
  • 處理器: 1 GHz Processor
  • 顯示卡: OpenGL Supported Graphics Adapter
  • 備註: Safari 8

linux_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Ubuntu 16.04
  • 處理器: 1 GHz Processor
  • 顯示卡: OpenGL Supported Graphics Adapter
